RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Purse 19800. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. non starters preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALENTINO FOUR KING held well, driving. HEZ OUR FIRST CALL came in start, steady bid. EB LITTLE O broke in, vied, outfinished. PATRONA FAVORITA no mishap, steady close. BERLIN bobbled, broke in. FABULOUS GREEN EAGLE veered in start. DADDYS SUGAR COOKEE broke in, even effort. HER WILD SPIRIT came out, in tight start. IMAGINE NATE BDP crowded start. EYE B WINNING pinched back start. The stewards' posted an inquiry concerning the start. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Imagine Nate Bdp
ENTRY.OWNER: Taylor Barre Lee Taylor Patti and McArthur Donna

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 870 Y Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WELL TA DO steadied start, set pressured pace, drew clear turn, mild urging. FS MAXXIMUMM came out start, pressed pace, lacked late rally, second best. PRINCE OF FAST pressed between, fell back, angled out, 6wide bid, up for show. BOURBON COWBOY bumped start, vied to turn, dropped back. ESPECIALLY TOXIC close to pace, inside trip, lacked a rally. DREAMINGFORAFEATURE off a step slowly, crowded, raced outside, swung wide turn. F J COLIMA broke in, off slow, far back early, no threat. JUST ONE REASON bumped start, angled out turn, lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: F J Colima
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, off slow, far back early, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Especially Toxic
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, inside trip, lacked a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between, fell back, angled out, 6wide bid, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Just One Reason
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, angled out turn, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, vied to turn, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Fs Maxximumm
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, pressed pace, lacked late rally, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamingforafeature
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slowly, crowded, raced outside, swung wide turn

ENTRY.NAME: Well Ta Do
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied start, set pressured pace, drew clear turn, mild urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 15200. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIT A NOTE dueled to the turn, inched away, was under pressure through the drive and held under steady urging. JUVAL dueled to the turn, swung out, continued willingly to the wire and couldn't match strides with the winner. ABSTRACT KAT was void of early speed, saved ground, angled out into the turn, went widest in the drive and closed well to get up late for show. MICKEYS GOLD raced close to the pace, bid off the rail, lacked the needed late rally and was caught for third. EMMYS SILVER advanced outside, rallied into the turn, bid six wide and didn't have enough late. LUCKY MATT pressed the pace along the inside, dropped back, closed along the rail and lacked the needed late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Abstract Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out into turn, widest drive, close, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Matt
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, fell back, closed rail, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Emmys Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: advanced outside, rallied into turn, 6wide bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Mickeys Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, bid off rail, lacked a late rally, caught for 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Hit a Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to turn, inched away, under pressure, steady urging, held

ENTRY.NAME: Juval
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, swung out turn, willingly to wire, couldn't match strides

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 870 Y Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 35200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AH MR LANA DEL RAY dueled between, inched clear, drifted out, all out. LOUISIANA POP dueled between, steadied into turn, lost whip into stretch, game. FANCI FANCY dueled 4-5wide, hung late, held for show. MARKUS AURELIUS pressed inside, fell back, closed well, gaining for show. PARLIAMENTARY SPIRIT close to pace, swung wide leaving turn, lacked a bid. TEMPT THE LADY dueled between horses, fell back turn, faded. MOON MAKER wide trip, not urged late. DAYCRUISER bore out into turn, not urged late.

ENTRY.NAME: Daycruiser
ENTRY.OWNER: McCloy Mark and McCloy Fay Annette
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out into turn, not urged late

ENTRY.NAME: Markus Aurelius
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, fell back, closed well, gaining for show

ENTRY.NAME: Tempt the Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled between horses, fell back turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Parliamentary Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, swung wide leaving turn, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Louisiana Pop
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled between, steadied into turn, lost whip into stretch, game

ENTRY.NAME: Ah Mr Lana Del Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled between, inched clear, drifted out, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Fanci Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 4-5wide, hung late, held for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 17100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEE ETTA vied inside, bid along the rail on the turn, assumed command with a short lead and held under pressure. SPEEDY WILDCAT vied between horses, went willingly to the wire and was outfinished in a good effort. BAND OF GLORY vied three across, weakened in the drive and held safely for show. ANNA B broke out, pressed the pace, swung wide leaving the turn and fell back. EPWORTH pressed the pace while racing outside, faltered on the turn and was not urged late. MISS TRICKY INDY was through early, stopped and not urged through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Gee Etta
ENTRY.OWNER: Crowell Robert Van and Robertson Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, bid rail turn, short lead, held under pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Wildcat
ENTRY.OWNER: Robison J Kirk and Robison Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, willingly to wire, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Band of Glory
ENTRY.OWNER: Alvarado Alfred and Valdez-Cabral Jr Martin M
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3across, weakened drive, safe for show

ENTRY.NAME: Anna B
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, pressed pace, swung wide turn, fell back,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Tricky Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, stopped, not urged stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Epworth
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace outside, faltered turn, not urged late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 350 Y Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOSSA NEAUVA drew clear, best. DYNASTY STAR V bumped start, steady bid. JESSA GOOD WINNER stumbled start. EYEMA LADY SOLDIER clear path, no mishap. QUEEN OF TIDE broke in, bumped. NECTAR clean trip. HOT LIL MARFA bumped start. SHEZ EAGLE no threat. DREAMERS SECRET bumped start. GOLDIE TRU stumbled badly start, off slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Bossa Neauva
ENTRY.OWNER: Amestoy Leslie A Amestoy Pierre Jean and Beasley Roger K

ENTRY.NAME: Jessa Good Winner
ENTRY.OWNER: Jungers Marc E Medlin Billy R Williams Brad and Reynolds Robert

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 19000. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120lbs.; Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STREET MARK was slow early, rallied around the turn, bid eight wide, closed willingly, got up late and drew clear. COMFORT J BYRD vied between horses, assumed command and inched clear leaving the turn, led to late stretch and was outclosed to finish second best. HORNS N HALOS veered in at the start, pressed the pace, challenged three across on the turn, fell back, finished evenly and held safely for show. EVERYROSEHASATHORN set a pressured pace to the turn, fell back, weakened in the drive and steadily faded. SI PASA ALGO stalked the pace along the rail, backed up on the turn and lacked a stretch response. ATTILA'S FLAK raced in the second flight three across, was through early and gave way. AWESOME ACCOUNT broke slowly and was pinched back at the start, trailed the field and showed little. LIKA DAGGER pulled up and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Si Pasa Algo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, backed up turn, no stretch response

ENTRY.NAME: Everyrosehasathorn
ENTRY.OWNER: Green Greg Yarbar R Dwain and MCM Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace to turn, fell back, weakened, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Comfort J Byrd
ENTRY.OWNER: Duncan BW Duncan Joe Duncan Valerie and Zamora Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, inched away into stretch,led late, outclosed

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Account
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, pinched back start, trailed, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Lika Dagger
ENTRY.OWNER: Amestoy Leslie A and Amestoy Jr Pierre Jean

ENTRY.NAME: Horns N Halos
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in start, pressed pace, challenged 3across turn, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Attila's Flak
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 3acros, through early, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Street Mark
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson Glen and McQueen Bobby J
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied turn, 8wide bid, closed, up late, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Derby Challenge S. RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 400 Y Dirt CR: 89. Derby Purse 65357. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE QUALIFIED FOR THE 2023 AQHA ADEQUAN DERBY CHALLENGE: Weight: 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEADING FLARE strong finish, up late. BIG DREAM BABY dueled throughout, gamely. INNOCENTI bore out badly. WHIRLAWAY VALENTINE clear path, steady bid. SASS CARTEL close throughout. WASTING LIGHT clean trip. LETHAL DEMON broke in air, came out. JESS A GOOD CANDYMAN pushed out, lost path. SUG LA BLUE broke awkwardly, off slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Lethal Demon
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown A Mark and Brown Peggy A

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 11600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOOM BOOM DADDY raced mid pack, rallied on the turn, bid seven wide, closed willingly, got up late and drew clear while drifting out. MAMIE'S LAST HOPE vied two across to the turn, drew clear, led to late stretch and was outclosed. CANDY TRACK was unhurried early, raced wide, bid eight wide, found his best stride late and got up for show. HUNDREDOLLAROIL was never far off the pace, rallied into the turn, challenged entering the stretch, vied for the lead and hung late to lose position. THE BUSINESS MAN settled off the pace, raced inside, got through along the rail on the turn, bid and hung. ROCKETT'S RED CITY got away well, vied inside to the turn, dropped back and gave way. JR'S CONFIDENCE saved ground, angled out into the turn and lacked a bid. HUNKALICIOUS was not urged and showed little in an even effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Jr's Confidence
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out into turn, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Track
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, raced wide, 8wide bid, best stride late, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Hundredollaroil
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied into turn, challenged into stretch, vied, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Hunkalicious
ENTRY.COMMENT: not urged, even effort, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Boom Boom Daddy
ENTRY.OWNER: Champion Racing Stable Elliott Bill LIttle Burl and Isbell Lois
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied turn, 7wide bid, closed willingly, up late, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: The Business Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, raced inside, got through rail turn, bid,hung,

ENTRY.NAME: Rockett's Red City
ENTRY.OWNER: Rockett M C and Armijo Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied inside to turn, dropped back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Mamie's Last Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across to turn, drew clear, led late, outclosed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge S. - Grade3 RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 350 Y Dirt CR: 92. Futurity Purse 144925. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE QUALIFIED FOR THE FINALS OF THE 2023 RUIDOSO DOWNS JOHN DEERE JUVENILE (Ten Fastest Times) (No Also Eligible List) Weight: 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MFS CHEERIO pushed in start, dueled, best. ACAPULCO BAY clear, dueled, gamely. FLYING SOPHIA came in start, close throughout. ONE LITTLE LIAR broke in, steady close, good effort. GABRIEL crowded start. DAWSON LEGATE broke in. FAVORITE NOVA broke in.

ENTRY.NAME: Mfs Cheerio
ENTRY.OWNER: RH Bros LLC and Cavazos Jr Anastacio

ENTRY.NAME: One Little Liar
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, steady close, good effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 11 350 Y Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 43600. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOOD DEE QUEEN dueled, drifted, best. DOS SPECIAL EYE clean trip, outfinished. WINE DONT LIE crowded start. ELISAS ESPERANCE fractious gate, broke in. RUN POTION in tight early, good effort. EBW DANCNTHEMOONLITE stumbled badly start, bumped. HEARTS MYSTIC RIME bumped, squeezed start.
